name: Telegrambot
tagline: PHP telegram bot api by: S#3NTAX
body:
Developed By : S3NTAX - sentax.ir
Email : Romidian70@gmail.com
Feel free to use this script :)
This PHP class can send (TEXT messages,photo,audio)

Supported Features

  • telegram virtual keyboards
  • captions on photos
  • Audios
  • Text messages
  • send audio and photo directly from url
  • reply to message

How to use

also i created a sample file that you can use it simply :)
just make your BOT with @botfather and paste your BOT token to script and set your webhook

how to set webhook

click on this link and paste your BOT token , webhost adress and done :)

you need SSL on your domain! its necessary

dont worry!
you can use free services such as heroku
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
